title: [Bug]: App doesn't start after recent update
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

No

### Describe the bug

After the newest update to 2.0.17 it doesn't start anymore

### What package are you using?

aur

### Version

2.0.17

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
1. Run `yay -Syu` (aka update to latest version)
2. Run `teams-for-linux`
3. error message (attached a screenshot)
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
to start the application
```

### Debug

```markdown
teams-for-linux --webDebug --logConfig='{}'

Same error (attached a screenshot)
```

### Additional context

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/24649337-f543-49d0-aec6-995b6a07fa93)

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/4d8208ce-35a9-4973-97eb-e03c99cacedb)
